page.title: 17POLICEMAN'S LOT
page.content: {TOUR OF DUTY 4pm TO 12 MIDNIGHT. CONFER WITH INSPECTOR AND ON BEAT. {4.50pm}REPORT FROM O.A.P._CHILDREN THROWING STONES AND SWEARING AT HIM. HE REQUESTED NO ACTION BUT BOTH CHILDREN(15YRS), WERE WARNED IN PRESENCE OF PARENTS.{6.15pm REPORT REGARDING GLUE SNIFFERS-THE 2 BOYS AGED 12 AND 13 WERE TAKEN HOME AND AN APPOINTMENT MADE FOR THEM TO SEE YOUTH COUNSELLING SERVICE{7pm}HEARD SHOOTING FROM OLD RAILWAY LINE,MAN FOUND FIRING AT RABBITS-ADMITTED HAVING NO SHOTGUN CERTIFICATE,GAME LICENCE OR PERMISSION TO SHOOT ON PRIVATE LAND.HE WAS TAKEN TO THE POLICE STATION.{8pm}MEAL AND REPORTS{9.20pmBETWEEN NOW AND MIDNIGHT {INCIDENTS INCLUDE;}2 MEN FIGHTING IN BAR,MAN DRIVING A CAR IN DANGEROUS CONDITION,GIRL FOUND IN POSSESSION OF CANNABIS AND WOMAN WITH CUTS TO FACE CAUSED BY DRUNKEN HUSBAND.
